description: A narrow corridor branches north from this winding, torch-lit hall.  Dense smoke and rock dust hang heavily in the still air, stinging eyes and throat alike, and a monotonous dripping sound echoes down the passage from somewhere to the west.  Above the nearest torch is a small grate, but if it once served to ventilate the hall, the earth and rubble pressing against the grate from the far side now prevent it from serving its function.
title: [Alchemist, Secret Junction]
